summary: The drab Jarl housecarls are now mighty.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2][color=#b4a7d6]In Vanilla, each Jarl has a personal housecarl. However all are weak and most are uninteresting. You would figure that only the mightiest hero of the hold would be the protector of their Jarl.

[u]FEATURES[/u]
Rich Loot Tables
Prestigious Name Titles
Deadly Weapons and/or Spells
Level 70 + Boosted Stats
Non-Essential
Faster 
No scripts[/color]

[color=#dd7e6b]IMPERIAL HOUSECARLS:
[/color][list][*][color=#dd7e6b]Bolgeir Bearclaw now Bolgeir the Bureaucrat (thalmor lightning mage) -Solitude
[/color][/*]
[*][color=#dd7e6b]Faleen now Enchantress Faleen (fire mage) -Markarth
[/color][/*]
[*][color=#dd7e6b]Gorm now Gorm the Shade (powerful vampire) -Morthal
[/color][/*]
[*][color=#dd7e6b]Helvard now First Ranger Helvard (elven archer) -Falkreath[/color]
[/*]
[/list]
[color=#a4c2f4]STORMCLOAK HOUSECARLS:
[/color][list][*][color=#a4c2f4]Galmar Stone-fist now General Stone-fist (2H brute) -Windhelm
[/color][/*]
[*][color=#a4c2f4]Jod now Admiral Jod (shield warrior) -Dawnstar
[/color][/*]
[*][color=#a4c2f4]Thaena now High Priestess Thaena (restoration/ice) -Winterhold
[/color][/*]
[*][color=#a4c2f4]Unmid Snow-Shod now Unmid the Enforcer (assassin) -Riften[/color][/*]
[/list][/size]
[list][*][color=#b4a7d6]Irileth now Irileth, Champion of Skyrim (1H warrior) -Whiterun[/color]
[/*]
[/list][size=2]
[color=#b4a7d6][u]NOTES[/u]
Battle housecarls at your own risk: 
Killing them can ruin quests, I do not recommend battling Irileth until after the main quest, she is a scripted main quest housecarl.
They're also some of the toughest NPCs and will have the help of the Jarl's men and guard.

You could do battle with housecarls of the opposing civil war faction.

Dawnguard and Dragonborn required.

[u]FUTURE[/u]
I may make the post-civil war Jarl housecarls mighty.[/color][/size]
author: Qwesar
